text: Marek Szpera (born 9 September 1987) is a Polish handball player for Energa MKS Kalisz and the Polish national team.EHF profile He competed at the 2013 World Men's Handball Championship.Statystyki ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male handball players Category:People from Ostrów Wielkopolski
title: Marek Szpera
